content: introducing the ultimate solution for a wasp-free summer say goodbye to those pesky stingers with this free crochet pattern for a puffy decoy wasp nest crafted with love and care this charming whimsical wasp nest replica will not only add a touch of rustic charm to your outdoor space but will also keep real wasps at bay reportedly the simple and enjoyable crochet pattern makes it easy for anyone to create their very own natural wasp deterrent safeguard your family and friends from unwanted insect intruders while adding a delightful touch of nature-inspired decor to your surroundings download the pattern today and crochet your way to a wasp-free oasis in your backyard size one size approximately 7 tall by 12 around skill level level 1/2 - beginner/easy terminology written in u s crochet terms yarn the pattern testers used 120-140 yards of yarn depending on the hook and yarn they used hobby lobby i love this cotton medium weight #4 yarn 100% cotton 180 yds per 3 5 oz skein less than 1 skein of each taupe sage curry glowing burnt sienna materials us size g/7 4 5 mm stitch markers poly-fil yarn needle scissors copyright ©2023 dana bernhardt all rights reserved this pattern may be printed for your personal use only do not reproduce sell or copy this pattern in any way you may sell finished products thank you dana of dana s wanderlust crochet https //www youtube com/@danaswanderlustcrochet email for pattern support danaswanderlustcrochet@gmail com
